title: The worst games of the year
summary: Assassinâ€™s Creed: Odyssey is forgettable, the combat is clunky, and the dialogue is cringeworthy. Street Fighter V: Arcade Edition is plagued with numerous bugs and glitches that have yet to be addressed. Fallout 76 is also marred by an uninteresting story and an underwhelming setting, which makes it feel like a step back for the series. Forza Horizon 4 is fun to play, but its progression system is unfairly stacked in favor of players willing to spend money on car parts and mods.

var d=Object.defineProperty,m=Object.defineProperties;var y=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var i=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var s=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,r=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var l=(e,t,o)=>t in e?d(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):e[t]=o,a=(e,t)=>{for(var o in t||(t={}))s.call(t,o)&&l(e,o,t[o]);if(i)for(var o of i(t))r.call(t,o)&&l(e,o,t[o]);return e},h=(e,t)=>m(e,y(t));var c=(e,t)=>{var o={};for(var n in e)s.call(e,n)&&t.indexOf(n)<0&&(o[n]=e[n]);if(e!=null&&i)for(var n of i(e))t.indexOf(n)<0&&r.call(e,n)&&(o[n]=e[n]);return o};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(o){var n=o,{components:e}=n,t=c(n,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,h(a(a({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`The video game industry is filled with great games. These are also some of the most challenging and difficult ones to make. Cracking the code on how to build a well-crafted and engaging video game requires practice, ingenuity, skill, and patience. But not every developer is up to the task. Some simply fail at creating an entertaining experience for players. This list compiles some of the disappointments from 2018 that failed to meet an acceptable standard of quality.
These are the worst games of 2018, broken down by category and listed in no particular order. Some might have had good intentions or interesting concepts, but fell short in their execution. If you\u2019re looking for something new to play this year, stay away from these titles as they won\u2019t give you your money\u2019s worth or much satisfaction beyond finishing them once (if that).`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

content.compiledSource: var d=Object.defineProperty,g=Object.defineProperties;var u=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var o=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var n=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,r=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,s,t)=>s in e?d(e,s,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:t}):e[s]=t,i=(e,s)=>{for(var t in s||(s={}))n.call(s,t)&&h(e,t,s[t]);if(o)for(var t of o(s))r.call(s,t)&&h(e,t,s[t]);return e},l=(e,s)=>g(e,u(s));var m=(e,s)=>{var t={};for(var a in e)n.call(e,a)&&s.indexOf(a)<0&&(t[a]=e[a]);if(e!=null&&o)for(var a of o(e))s.indexOf(a)<0&&r.call(e,a)&&(t[a]=e[a]);return t};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(t){var a=t,{components:e}=a,s=m(a,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,l(i(i({},layoutProps),s),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("h2",null,"Action Games"),mdx("p",null,"Assassin\u2019s Creed: Odyssey \u2013 This open-world action-adventure game has a lot of content, but that\u2019s where the positives end. The story is forgettable, the combat is clunky, and the dialogue is cringeworthy. In addition, the game comes with serious technical issues, which is surprising given its long development cycle. The new dialogue system, which allows players to choose between multiple options to advance the plot, is particularly bad. There are loads of bugs, and the system is prone to creating strange situations where you can\u2019t proceed further with the game. For example, at one point, I couldn\u2019t progress because someone thought I was in love with them, but I couldn\u2019t figure out how to tell them otherwise. The game is also very buggy and crash-prone, and its visuals are below average."),mdx("h2",null),mdx("h2",null),mdx("h2",null,"Fighting Games"),mdx("p",null,"Street Fighter V: Arcade Edition \u2013 The latest installment in Capcom\u2019s legendary fighting game series. Sadly, it\u2019s just more of the same with a few superficial changes and no real improvement over its predecessor. Most of the modes are extremely barebones, which is disappointing given the game\u2019s premium price. What\u2019s more, SFV is plagued with numerous bugs and glitches that have yet to be addressed. The game\u2019s netcode is also poor; so much so that it\u2019s impossible to take the online mode seriously. Capcom promises that it will address the issues in the coming months, but it\u2019s hard to take them seriously when they let things get this out of control in the first place."),mdx("h2",null,"Racing Games"),mdx("p",null,"Forza Horizon 4 \u2013 Rare\u2019s latest open-world racing game is fun to play, but it\u2019s marred by microtransactions. The game\u2019s progression system is unfairly stacked in favor of players who are willing to spend money on car parts and mods. It\u2019s especially annoying given that the game itself costs a lot of money. Even if you don\u2019t engage in the game\u2019s pay-to-win economy, you\u2019ll still be at a disadvantage compared to those who do. There\u2019s also the poorly-implemented online racing, which has been marked by numerous disconnects and server issues. What\u2019s more, the developers have been unhelpful in fixing the issues. It\u2019s a shame, too, because the game is otherwise a lot of fun to play."),mdx("h2",null,"Role-playing Games"),mdx("p",null,"Fallout 76 \u2013 It\u2019s unfortunate that Bethesda\u2019s latest open-world RPG is plagued with numerous bugs and glitches, including visual errors and quest-breaking bugs. These issues are especially evident in the game\u2019s multiplayer mode, where players sometimes get stuck in the environment or suffer from sound and visual desynchronization. Other reports suggest that the game\u2019s server is underpowered, which may explain why it\u2019s struggling to keep up with all the online traffic. Bethesda has said that it will work on fixing the issues, but we\u2019re yet to see any noticeable improvement. Fallout 76 is also marred by an uninteresting story and an underwhelming setting, which makes it feel like a step back for the series."),mdx("h2",null,"Sports Games"),mdx("p",null,"FIFA 19 \u2013 EA\u2019s annual football game is fun to play, but it has become stale and uninteresting over the years. What\u2019s more, FIFA 19 is plagued by microtransactions. It\u2019s the same old FIFA Ultimate Team (FUT) with a few small changes that don\u2019t address the core problem with the system: it\u2019s just too easy to spend real money on virtual items. EA\u2019s promise to change the system hasn\u2019t materialized either; the current iteration is just as bad as its predecessors. There have also been reports of visual bugs and glitches, which is surprising considering how long EA had been in development on FIFA 19."),mdx("h2",null,"Strategy Games"),mdx("p",null,"Total War: Three Kingdoms \u2013 Creative Assembly\u2019s latest strategy game is a big disappointment, especially after the high bar set by its predecessor. The game\u2019s campaign mode is extremely shallow, and it has a poor user interface. What\u2019s more, the AI is flawed, and the game doesn\u2019t support multiplayer. The game\u2019s visuals and performance are far from stellar as well. All in all, this is a disappointing game from a series that\u2019s known for high quality and challenging gameplay. Hopefully, CA learns from its mistakes and comes up with something better next time."),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"2018 has been an interesting year for video games. It has seen the release of several blockbuster titles, such as God of War, Red Dead Redemption 2, and Assassin\u2019s Creed Odyssey. It has also seen the rise of battle royale games, such as Blackout (Black Ops 4) and Ring of Elysium. It has also seen the fall of several franchises, such as Assassin\u2019s Creed, and the rise of new IPs."),mdx("p",null,"What has also become apparent from this list of the worst games of 2018 is that there is no shortage of bad games. With so many coming out every year, there are some that simply fail to meet even the most basic standards of quality. Some are buggy, poorly made, and poorly designed. Others try too many gimmicks that don\u2019t work out as intended. In short, it pays to be a vigilant gamer and do your research before buying a game."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best and Worst Games of the Year

var h=Object.defineProperty,p=Object.defineProperties;var w=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var n=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,i=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var l=(e,t,a)=>t in e?h(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:a}):e[t]=a,s=(e,t)=>{for(var a in t||(t={}))r.call(t,a)&&l(e,a,t[a]);if(n)for(var a of n(t))i.call(t,a)&&l(e,a,t[a]);return e},d=(e,t)=>p(e,w(t));var u=(e,t)=>{var a={};for(var o in e)r.call(e,o)&&t.indexOf(o)<0&&(a[o]=e[o]);if(e!=null&&n)for(var o of n(e))t.indexOf(o)<0&&i.call(e,o)&&(a[o]=e[o]);return a};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(a){var o=a,{components:e}=o,t=u(o,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,d(s(s({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`It takes a lot of great games to make a great year. In 2018, we saw new entries in long-running series like Red Dead Redemption, Assassin\u2019s Creed, and Halo as well as brand new IP such as Monster Hunter: World, Into the Breach, and A Way Out. It was a year that saw game developers pushed by streaming services like Twitch and YouTube continue to experiment with new ideas and designs while also returning to their roots with older properties.
That being said, not all games are created equal. There are excellent games and then there are... others less so. To help you sort through the deluge of new releases this year, Gamers Central has compiled a list of our top ten favorite titles coupled with an even longer list of disappointments that you may want to avoid entirely or at least wait for a sale before picking up.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The rules may be simple, but there is actually so much strategy involved that it\u2019s almost like learning a whole new game every time you sit down to play. If you enjoy playing solitaire games as much as we do, then you\u2019ll probably also agree that there are a lot of different variations of the game itself as well. Some versions of solitaire require skill, luck, and a little bit of patience all at once.
These top rated games are some of the most fun and engaging ways to play this classic card game. Whether you prefer an easy version with higher rewards or something more strategic and challenging, these solitaire games will keep your interest from start to finish!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best Games of the Year for Kids

intro.compiledSource: var m=Object.defineProperty,p=Object.defineProperties;var y=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var n=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var i=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,r=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,t,a)=>t in e?m(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:a}):e[t]=a,s=(e,t)=>{for(var a in t||(t={}))i.call(t,a)&&h(e,a,t[a]);if(n)for(var a of n(t))r.call(t,a)&&h(e,a,t[a]);return e},d=(e,t)=>p(e,y(t));var l=(e,t)=>{var a={};for(var o in e)i.call(e,o)&&t.indexOf(o)<0&&(a[o]=e[o]);if(e!=null&&n)for(var o of n(e))t.indexOf(o)<0&&r.call(e,o)&&(a[o]=e[o]);return a};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(a){var o=a,{components:e}=o,t=l(o,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,d(s(s({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,"Gaming is an activity that has been enjoyed by kids for many years and it shows no sign of stopping. In fact, the market for kids games has grown so much that there is now a range of specialist games developers who only make games targeted at this audience. The release of new gaming devices such as the Nintendo Switch, Google Stadia and the Xbox Scarlett has also led to a renewed interest in kid-friendly games from parents and other adult gamers. Here we have put together our favorite kid-friendly video games that you can play at home with your child or let them play on their own to help develop their skills."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The 5 Most Underrated Games of the Year

intro.compiledSource:
var l=Object.defineProperty,u=Object.defineProperties;var m=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var r=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var s=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,i=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var d=(e,t,a)=>t in e?l(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:a}):e[t]=a,n=(e,t)=>{for(var a in t||(t={}))s.call(t,a)&&d(e,a,t[a]);if(r)for(var a of r(t))i.call(t,a)&&d(e,a,t[a]);return e},h=(e,t)=>u(e,m(t));var g=(e,t)=>{var a={};for(var o in e)s.call(e,o)&&t.indexOf(o)<0&&(a[o]=e[o]);if(e!=null&&r)for(var o of r(e))t.indexOf(o)<0&&i.call(e,o)&&(a[o]=e[o]);return a};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(a){var o=a,{components:e}=o,t=g(o,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,h(n(n({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`Video games have become a big part of our culture. Millions of people around the world play video games every day, and some even make it their career. In 2018 alone, over 200 new video games were released. It\u2019s important to keep tabs on all the new releases so you don\u2019t miss out on anything great. That being said, there are a lot of video games that aren\u2019t receiving the attention they deserve for various reasons.
Did you know that the average video game player is getting older? According to recent data, the average age of video gamers is now 35 years old! That means most gaming enthusiasts probably won\u2019t find as many underrated games as they would have when they were younger. However, there are still plenty of underrated gems out there that are well worth checking out this year! Here are the top 5 underrated video games of 2018:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The 5 Most Overrated Games of the Year

intro.compiledSource:
var m=Object.defineProperty,d=Object.defineProperties;var p=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var s=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,n=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var l=(e,t,a)=>t in e?m(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:a}):e[t]=a,i=(e,t)=>{for(var a in t||(t={}))r.call(t,a)&&l(e,a,t[a]);if(s)for(var a of s(t))n.call(t,a)&&l(e,a,t[a]);return e},h=(e,t)=>d(e,p(t));var u=(e,t)=>{var a={};for(var o in e)r.call(e,o)&&t.indexOf(o)<0&&(a[o]=e[o]);if(e!=null&&s)for(var o of s(e))t.indexOf(o)<0&&n.call(e,o)&&(a[o]=e[o]);return a};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(a){var o=a,{components:e}=o,t=u(o,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,h(i(i({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`It is the time of year when game journalists and bloggers around the world start posting lists of their favourite video games from the past 12 months. These are often referred to as \u201CGame of the Year\u201D awards, but they are not all created equal. Some use a points-based system, while others ask critics to vote on individual games and not just give them a list of possible answers.
There is also no standard definition for what qualifies as an \u201Coverrated\u201D game. Some people might interpret it to mean any game that received generally positive reviews but has little chance of winning a Game of the Year award. Others assume it must be a high-profile title that almost everyone agrees is terrible but continues to sell well because it has been overhyped by gaming journalists and analysts. In this article we will look at five overrated video games from 2018 that were widely praised, but do not measure up to their reputation.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The Best Games of the Year for Couples

var c=Object.defineProperty,p=Object.defineProperties;var y=Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptors;var n=Object.getOwnPropertySymbols;var r=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty,s=Object.prototype.propertyIsEnumerable;var h=(e,t,o)=>t in e?c(e,t,{enumerable:!0,configurable:!0,writable:!0,value:o}):e[t]=o,i=(e,t)=>{for(var o in t||(t={}))r.call(t,o)&&h(e,o,t[o]);if(n)for(var o of n(t))s.call(t,o)&&h(e,o,t[o]);return e},g=(e,t)=>p(e,y(t));var l=(e,t)=>{var o={};for(var a in e)r.call(e,a)&&t.indexOf(a)<0&&(o[a]=e[a]);if(e!=null&&n)for(var a of n(e))t.indexOf(a)<0&&s.call(e,a)&&(o[a]=e[a]);return o};const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent(o){var a=o,{components:e}=a,t=l(a,["components"]);return mdx(MDXLayout,g(i(i({},layoutProps),t),{components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"}),mdx("p",null,`It\u2019s the most wonderful time of the year. From binge-watching Christmas TV specials to baking gingerbread cookies and sipping hot cocoa, there are plenty of ways to get into the holiday spirit. And what better way to keep that good cheer going than by playing a game with your significant other?
With so many different board games available on the market, it can be challenging to figure out which ones are worth investing in. Thankfully, this list features some of the best games perfect for couples this holiday season. Whether you\u2019re looking for a light-hearted romp or an intense challenge that brings you closer as partners, these games have you covered.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Top 5 Games of the Year

We spend lots of time playing them, talking about them with friends and family, thinking about them and even dreaming about them. The games we play also reflect who we are as individuals. They serve as a mirror that reflects back an image of our unique personalities. Each one of us has different preferences and taste in games. There\u2019s also a lot to choose from, too: There are so many video games today that no individual can ever hope to try them all. That said, there are some great ones out there and they come in all shapes and sizes: Action-adventure, shooters, RPGs; you name it! Here is a list of the top 5 games this year that you must play if you haven\u2019t already:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The Best Games of the Year for People Who like to Win
